LanguageData.sd_adv_powergen_adv_wind_turbine.label: advanced wind turbine
LanguageData.sd_adv_powergen_adv_wind_turbine.descrip: A wind-powered electrical generator. Requires a large clear space in front and behind for optimal air flow. Energy Output: 6000 at max
LanguageData.sd_adv_powergen_adv_solar_generator.desc: Produces electricity from sunlight. Does not work in the dark. Energy Output: 3400 at max
LanguageData.sd_adv_powergen_adv_geothermal_generator: Produces electricity from geothermal steam geysers. Must be placed on a geyser. Energy Output: 7500
LanguageData.sd_adv_powergen_nuclear_power_plant.desc: Produces electricity from uranium. Can be placed anywhere. Energy Output: 20000
LanguageData.sd_adv_powergen_WatermillGenerator.label: advanced watermill generator
LanguageData.sd_adv_powergen_WatermillGenerator.descr: Produces electricity from a river. Must be placed with its wheel in moving water. If watermills are placed too close together, the turbulence they generate will interfere and reduce power generation. Energy Output: 2200
